title: Price Drop! Lease Our ONLY 1 Bed 1 Bath Home! Apply Today!
posting_body: Newport Crossing Apartments in Newcastle, WA
At Newport Crossing, you'll find a unique community offering a peaceful refuge from the hustle and bustle of life.

Our newly renovated one, two and three bedroom apartment homes come with upscale stainless steel appliances, dark cherry cabinets, upgraded lighting, beautiful brushed nickel fixtures, expansive walk-in closets, and wood burning fireplaces.
This beautiful retreat offers mature landscaped grounds perfect for gathering in the shade at our barbecue area or unwinding in our heated pool.
Or, venture just a few minutes outside and you'll find lush parks such as Lake Boren Park or Newcastle Beach Park.
We are centrally located with easy access to I-5 and I-405.
At Newport Crossing, our residents enjoy ample amenities and state of the art features such as our 24 hour fitness center and indoor Jacuzzi.
Whether you have a maintenance request, need directions or a restaurant recommendation, we are happily at your service.
Schedule a personalized tour today and discover how much better life can be!
Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 693 Sq.
7311 Coal Creek Parkway SE, Newcastle, WA, 98059
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
